query policySplitTunnelPolicy ( $accountId:ID! $splitTunnelPolicyInput:SplitTunnelPolicyInput) {
	policy ( accountId:$accountId ) {
		splitTunnel {
			policy ( input:$splitTunnelPolicyInput   ) {
				enabled
				rules {
					audit {
						updatedTime
						updatedBy
					}
					rule {
						id
						name
						description
						index
						section {
							id
							name
						}
						enabled
						source {
							user {
								id
								name
							}
							usersGroup {
								id
								name
							}
						}
						platform
						country {
							id
							name
						}
						action
						destination {
							application {
								id
								name
							}
							globalIpRange {
								id
								name
							}
						}
						sourceNetwork {
							sourceNetworkType
						}
						coverage
						dnsExclusion {
							domain
						}
						routingPriority
					}
					properties
				}
				sections {
					audit {
						updatedTime
						updatedBy
					}
					section {
						id
						name
					}
					properties
				}
				audit {
					publishedTime
					publishedBy
				}
				revision {
					id
					name
					description
					changes
					createdTime
					updatedTime
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}
